items.name: Chatgpt
items.description: ChatGPT is an AI language model developed by OpenAI, capable of understanding and generating human-like text based on a wide range of prompts.

items.name: DeepSeek
items.description: DeepSeek is a Chinese AI company focused on developing large language models (LLMs) and artificial general intelligence (AGI).

items.name: Claude
items.description: Claude is an AI assistant created by Anthropic, designed to help with a wide range of tasks like writing, analysis, coding, and problem-solving.

items.name: Blackbox
items.description: Blackbox AI is an artificial intelligence platform tailored for software development, providing precise and context-aware coding assistance.

items.name: Gemini
items.description: Gemini is designed to understand and operate across different types of information, including text, code, images, audio, and video.

items.name: Microsoft Copilot
items.description: Microsoft Copilot is a cutting-edge AI companion designed to assist you with a variety of tasks and provide information, inspiration, and support.

items.name: Perplexity
items.description: Perplexity is a free AI-powered search engine. It searches the internet in real-time, identifies relevant sources, and generates high-quality answers.

items.name: DeepAI
items.description: DeepAI is a platform that provides a wide range of advanced AI tools and services, including image recognition, text analysis, video generator, AI music generator, and language translation.

items.name: Jasper
items.description: Jasper AI is a generative AI platform designed for marketers to create high-quality, on-brand written and visual content, and improve marketing workflows.

items.name: Copy.ai
items.description: Copy.ai uses AI to help you generate marketing copy, blog posts, and other written content quickly and effectively.

items.name: Runway ML
items.description: Runway ML offers tools for creating and editing videos using AI, a research company building the next era of art, includes text-to-video capabilities.

items.name: ApyHub
items.description: This Utility API allows you to convert currencies from a source currency to multiple target currencies.

items.name: HTMLrev
items.description: HTMLrev by Devluc provides selected free HTML templates for websites, landing pages, blogs, portfolios, ecommerce and admin dashboards.

items.name: Google Calendar
items.description: Google Calendar API is a web-based API (Application Programming Interface) that allows developers to interact with Google Calendar.

items.name: Indie Pitcher
items.description: IndiePitcher REST API allows you to send emails, manage your contacts, and generate portal session to manage userâ€™s contact lists.

items.name: Scrapfly
items.description: Scrapfly offers a range of APIs that allow users to scrape web pages, capture screenshots, extract structured data using AI.

items.name: Dragon Ball
items.description: Dragon Ball API grants users access to an extensive database featuring characters, images, transformations, and planets from the Dragon Ball.

items.name: Grib Stream
items.description: This API provides access to retrieve historical and forecasted weather data by specifying parameters such as time range, and coordinates

items.name: News API
items.description: The main use of News API is to search through every article published by over 150,000 news sources and blogs in the last 5 years.

items.name: Undraw
items.description: Undraw is a constantly updated collection of beautiful svg images that you can use completely free and without attribution.

items.name: Open Doodles
items.description: Open Doodles is a set of free illustrations. You can copy, edit, remix, share, or redraw these images for any purpose without restriction under copyright

items.name: DrawKit
items.description: DrawKit was founded in 2018, starting as a small collection of 20 free-to-use, hand-drawn UI illustrations.

items.name: Blush
items.description: Blush is a free illustration library that allows you to create and customize beautiful illustrations for your projects.

items.name: Absurd Design
items.description: Absurd Design is a collection of free illustrations that are absurd, surreal, and whimsical.
